```{r generate_calendar, eval = FALSE, echo=FALSE}
## data frame with dates & topics
cal_data<-read.csv("calendar_data.csv")

## display calendar
calendar(cal_data,navigation = T, defaultDate=as.Date("2025-09-24")) %>%
cal_month_options(
startDayOfWeek=0,
narrowWeekend=T
) %>%
cal_props(cal_data)
```
